pipelayer.label: Show deconstruction warning
pipelayer.description: When enabled, show a warning with the number of pipes marked for deconstruction when deconstructing a pipe connector.

pipelayer.label: Update period
pipelayer.description: How often in ticks to update a network.\n\nIncrease to reduce UPS consumption, decrease for more frequent fluid transfers.

pipelayer.label: Transfer threshold
pipelayer.description: The minimum amount of fluid for an input and the minimum amount of space for an output to transfer fluid between them.\n\nIncrease to reduce UPS consumption (you may also need to increase Connector capacity), decrease to reduce buffered fluid.

pipelayer.label: Show network IDs
pipelayer.description: Shows numbers over underground pipes identifying what network they are a part of.

pipelayer.label: Marker range
pipelayer.description: How far from the player to display markers while holding an underground pipe connector.
